member.summary: An non equality compare is executed. With string values, a case sensitivity flag may effect the result.

member.summary: A GreaterThan compare is executed. With string values, a case sensitivity flag may effect the result.

member.summary: A greater than or equal compare is executed. With string values, a case sensitivity flag may effect the result.

member.summary: A less than compare is executed. With string values, a case sensitivity flag may effect the result.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.FlatData.ComparisonOperator.LessThanOrEqual
member.summary: A less than or equal compare is executed. With string values, a case sensitivity flag may effect the result.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.FlatData.ComparisonOperator.StartsWith
member.summary: Evaluates if a string begins with a compared value. With string values, a case sensitivity flag may effect the result.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.FlatData.ComparisonOperator.DoesNotStartWith
member.summary: Evaluates if a string does not begin with a compared value. With string values, a case sensitivity flag may effect the result.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.FlatData.ComparisonOperator.EndsWith
member.summary: Evaluates if a string ends with a compared value. With string values, a case sensitivity flag may effect the result.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.FlatData.ComparisonOperator.DoesNotEndWith
member.summary: Evaluates if a string does not end with a compared value. With string values, a case sensitivity flag may effect the result.

member.summary: Evaluates if a string contains a compared value. With string values, a case sensitivity flag may effect the result.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Olap.FlatData.ComparisonOperator.DoesNotContain
member.summary: Evaluates if a string does not contain a compared value. With string values, a case sensitivity flag may effect the result.
